skill.name: turborepo-caching
skill.description: Configure Turborepo for efficient monorepo builds with local and remote caching. Use when setting up Turborepo, optimizing build pipelines, or implementing distributed caching.
skill.summary: Configure Turborepo for efficient monorepo builds with local and remote caching. Use when setting up...

security_audit.summary: No credential access, exfiltration, or malicious execution patterns were found. Content is instructional and aligned with build optimization.

content.user_title: Optimize Turborepo caching for faster builds
content.value_statement: Slow monorepo builds waste developer time and CI minutes. This skill shows clear Turborepo caching and pipeline setup to speed work.
actual_capabilities: Provide turbo.json pipeline templates with outputs and inputs
Describe Vercel remote cache login and CI env setup
Show self hosted remote cache server example
List filter and scope commands for targeted builds
Share cache debugging commands and flags
limitations: Does not run Turborepo commands or validate your repo
Does not create or manage Vercel tokens
Does not deploy the self hosted cache server
Does not resolve project specific build failures

use_cases.title: Accelerate CI builds
use_cases.description: Tune pipelines and filters to reduce CI time while keeping correct dependencies.

use_cases.title: Improve monorepo builds
use_cases.description: Set cache outputs and inputs for web apps to cut local rebuilds.

use_cases.title: Enable remote caching
use_cases.description: Set up Vercel or self hosted cache configuration for shared artifacts.

prompt_templates.title: Start caching
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a basic turbo.json with build, test, lint, and dev tasks for apps and packages.

prompt_templates.title: CI optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: Suggest CI steps and filters to build only affected packages since main.

prompt_templates.title: Remote cache
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain how to enable Vercel remote caching and required environment variables.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced inputs
prompt_templates.prompt: Refine inputs and outputs for a Next.js app to reduce cache invalidation.

output_examples.input: Help me tune turbo.json for a Next.js app and a shared UI package.
output: Define build outputs for .next and dist folders
Set inputs to src and config files only
Keep dev task persistent and uncached

best_practices: Define explicit inputs and outputs for cache keys
Enable remote caching for CI and local parity
Use filters to limit builds to affected packages
anti_patterns: Caching dev servers or long running tasks
Including secrets in cached environment variables
Over filtering and missing dependency builds

faq.question: Which environments are supported?
faq.answer: It targets Turborepo projects on local machines and common CI runners.

faq.question: Are there limits on project size?
faq.answer: There are no hard limits, but large repos need careful inputs and outputs.

faq.question: Can it integrate with Vercel remote cache?
faq.answer: Yes, it provides the login, link, and CI variable guidance.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No, it does not read files or send data anywhere.

faq.question: What if caching does not work?
faq.answer: Use the debug and summarize flags to inspect cache misses.

faq.question: How does it compare to other monorepo tools?
faq.answer: It focuses on Turborepo caching patterns, not a tool comparison.
